DOC.brief_summary: A 2-year , Multicenter , Open-label , Phase IIIb Extension Study Assess Bone Mineral Density Bone Turnover Response 5 mg Daily Risedronate Treatment Women Postmenopausal Osteoporosis Who Sequentially Completed Clinical Studies RVE009093 , RVE1996077 , RVE1998080 , RVE2001079 ( NCT01249261 )
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess BMD Bone Turnover Response 5 mg Daily Risedronate Treatment Women With PMO
DOC.detailed_description: A 2-year , Multicenter , Open-label , Phase IIIb Extension Study Assess Bone Mineral Density Bone Turnover Response 5 mg Daily Risedronate Treatment Women Postmenopausal Osteoporosis Who Sequentially Completed Clinical Studies RVE009093 , RVE1996077 , RVE1998080 , RVE2001079 ( NCT01249261 )
DOC.criteria: satisfactorily complete Clinical Study RVE2001079 ( Year 8 extension study ) Can use bone modify substance except risedronate
